title: LF Clash Team TOP MAIN
body: Was plat 1 season 7 but quit due to life.. am now back on a new account and am looking for a gold + team with comms and who practice as 5 when we can in flex/normals. Add AaronoULK in game and hit me up there[](https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=AaronoUlK)

replies.body:
I'm still building a team with gold+ players mostly high gold and up currently top is pending and mid jg are open is there a pref role 

[My Team](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/L89qm2Az-lf-gold-players-for-clash-topmidjungle-needed)


I'm looking for active players thats gonna be practicing as 5 in normal search and against another remade 5 Voice comms is not yet confirmed
